author: thomreis
body:
#### PR description:

The ECAL test beam digis producer module in SimCalorimetry/EcalTestBeam is not used anymore and is removed.

The `EcalTBReadout` class in SimCalorimetry/EcalTestBeamAlgos is also removed because the `EcalTBDigiProducer` was the only user of the class to my knowledge. Since the class is the only one in the SimCalorimetry/EcalTestBeamAlgos package it can be removed as well.

Discussed in #37760 
Removing `EcalTBReadout` will affect #37992 as well.

#### PR validation:

Passes the standard matrix tests
title: ECAL - Remove obsolete test beam code
